name: Bruno Mineo
summaryContent: A dedicated and versatile professional with a background in psychology and human resources, now expanding into technology with a focus on ChatGPT development and mobile applications. Proven ability to bridge communication gaps, analyze needs, and create effective solutions in both human-centric and technical fields.

experience.title: ChatGPT Developer
experience.description: Development of prompts on ChatGPT and construction of a mobile application in the psychological counseling sector.

experience.title: Mediator (Bemiddelaar)
experience.description: Expertise in matching job seekers with vacancies, client needs analysis, digital tool deployment, and promoting sustainable work relationships.

experience.title: HR Assistant
experience.description: HR assistant in charge of employee management in a social enterprise.

experience.title: Project Manager
experience.description: Integration of autistic children in extracurricular activities.

experience.title: Night Educator
experience.company: IRSA - Royal Institute for Deaf and Blind
experience.description: Night supervisor in a boarding school for blind and autistic children.

experience.title: Pedagogical Coordinator
experience.description: Pedagogical, theoretical and administrative coordination of a team of teachers.

experience.title: Specialized Education Teacher
experience.description: Pedagogical support for psychotic children in French, mathematics and music.

jobMatch.title: AI Job Matching
jobMatch.description: Enter a job title or complete job description. The AI will analyze the match with the resume using recruitment and HR expertise.
jobMatch.placeholder: Enter job title or complete description here...
jobMatch.simulatedAnalysis:
**Part 1: Strengths of the Profile in Relation to the Job Description**

*   **Multifaceted Background:** Bruno's unique blend of psychology, HR, and emerging tech skills (ChatGPT development, mobile apps) makes him highly adaptable and capable of understanding both human and technical aspects of a role.
*   **Strong Interpersonal Skills:** His experience as a Mediator and Psychological Counselor indicates excellent communication, empathy, and conflict resolution abilities, crucial for roles involving team collaboration or client interaction.
*   **Proactive Learning & Adaptation:** The transition into ChatGPT and mobile app development demonstrates a strong drive for continuous learning and adapting to new technologies, which is highly valuable in dynamic environments.
*   **Language Proficiency:** Fluency in multiple languages (French, Italian, English, Dutch) is a significant asset for international teams or roles requiring diverse communication.

**Part 2: Areas of Concern or Weaknesses of the Profile in Relation to the Job Description**

*   **Limited Direct Experience in Pure Tech Roles:** While he has experience in ChatGPT and mobile app development, the resume doesn't provide extensive details on large-scale software development projects or specific technical stacks beyond general mentions. More concrete examples of technical contributions would strengthen this area.
*   **Project Management Scale:** His project management experience (e.g., Badje ASBL) seems to be on a smaller scale. For very large or complex projects, additional demonstrated experience might be beneficial.

**Part 3: Score out of 100 for the Profile, Along with a Summary of Your Evaluation**

**Score: 88/100**

**Summary:** Bruno Mineo presents a highly compelling profile, particularly for roles that require a blend of strong interpersonal skills, analytical thinking, and a proactive approach to technology. His background in psychology and HR provides a solid foundation for understanding human dynamics, while his recent ventures into AI and mobile development showcase a forward-thinking and adaptable mindset. The areas for development are primarily about providing more granular detail on technical projects to fully leverage his emerging tech skills. Overall, he is a strong candidate with significant potential, especially in roles that value a holistic skill set and a human-centric approach to technology.
